com.codecool.shop.controller

Class ProductController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.controller.ProductController

  • public class ProductController
extends java.lang.Object
    ProductController class is responsible for rendering the index page and showing all the Products stored in the storage.

      • paramFiller

        public static java.util.Map paramFiller(spark.Request req)
        This method is responsible for filling "params" HashMap with all the data the frontend page will need upon rendering.
        Parameters:
        req - Request object is needed to handle session.
        Returns:
        a HashMap filled with parameters needed by the rendering methods.
